response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but its true worth lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate it fully. Considering its significance and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a special offer. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $1,100,000. This price reflects its high quality and the exclusivity it brings. I believe this is an attractive proposition that allows you to benefit significantly from its features while also providing me with a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1100000}
